bug.author: George3d6
bug.summary: Issues running unit tests in travis
bug.description:
At the moment travis seems to silently fail if I add pytests to the .travis.yml, but I see no relevant logs. Running it locally I get the error: <denchmark-code>ERROR: usage: pytest [options] [file_or_dir] [file_or_dir] [...] pytest: error: unrecognized arguments: --randomly-seed=42 inifile: /home/george/mindsdb/pytest.ini rootdir: /home/george/mindsdb </denchmark-code>
Maybe it's an issue to do with the specific version being used ? If so we should try to support the latest (>= 5.4.x) and explicitly ask for that to be installed when running the test on travis.
